SqlServer
insert into xt_user (pass_word, delete_flag, `name`, sex, paper_type, social_no, tel, e_mail, home_address, exec_unit) values (#{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{paperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xt_user set pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, paper_type = #{paperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_no = #{socialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_mail = #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_address = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exec_unit = #{execUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_mi = #{userMi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_mi, pass_word, delete_flag, `name`, sex, paper_type, social_no, tel, e_mail, home_address, exec_unit from xt_user where user_mi = #{userMi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_mi, pass_word, delete_flag, `name`, sex, paper_type, social_no, tel, e_mail, home_address, exec_unit from xt_user
